alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 9:31AM CDT until May 30 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rock County in north central Nebraska... Southeastern Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Holt County in north central Nebraska... Eastern Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... Boyd County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 931 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rose, or 24 miles northeast of Brewster, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bassett, Spencer, Atkinson, Stuart, Butte, Long Pine, Lynch, Newport, Naper, Gross, Rose, Bristow, Emmet, Dustin, Anoka, Monowi, Raven, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area, Hull Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Duff. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 155 and 182. Highway 20 between mile markers 250 and 303. Highway 281 between mile markers 188 and 223. Highway 12 between mile markers 70 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Boyd; Brown; Holt; Keya Paha; Rock
